oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Overseas chevron that belonged to Hubert Lee Gibson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This machine embroidered chevron on a drab woolen backing would have been sewn on the lower left sleeve of the uniform coat to indicate six months service overseas. It belonged to Pvt. Hubert Lee Gibson, HQ Detachment, 6th Div. Gibson seems to list his homes as both Knoxville, Knox County and Newport, Cocke County, Tennessee. Although he was born in Tennessee he listed his residence and place of employment as Cleveland, Ohio on his draft card.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
